description: Get a clearer picture of testing progress with D3, Dancer and Devel::Cover. I'll explain the basics of D3, Javascript and Dancer in order to generate shiny graphs for management showing off how good your test suites are.
short_description: Get a clearer picture of testing progress with D3, Dancer and Devel::Cover. I'll explain the basics of D3, Javascript and Dancer
title: LPW2014 DrForr   ‎Shiny Happy Testsuites‎ mp4 ff
